title: Making some thousands and forgetting about it: Crypto markets and volatility
summary: The unpredictable nature of crypto markets and why leverage trading is an uphill battle

body.raw: In early 2024, I decided to deploy some of my money to crypto markets. More specifically, Hyperliquid.xyz, a leverage-trading platform.
